summary: CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ON, VEHICLE WILL NOT PASS EMISSIONS TESTING.  AUDI DETERMINED THAT IT WAS DUE TO A FUEL LEAK FROM A CRACK IN THE PASSENGER SIDE REAR ROLLOVER VALVE.
